title: Siesta Recipe
full_text:
Siesta Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
silver tequila (100% agave)
1/2
ounce
Campari
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
lime juice
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
grapefruit juice
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
Garnish:
grapefruit twist
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then add tequila, Campari, lime juice, grapefruit juice, and simple syrup. Shake well and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with grapefruit twist.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, strainer
Tequila
Summer
